attributes.action: Put the brakes on boy racers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many road deaths are caused by inexperienced drivers driving more powerful cars than they can control. So drivers under the age of 25 should be restricted to cars with engines of 1000cc or less for personal use (they should still be able to drive commercial vehicles of any engine size their license permits). This initiative would also have the added benefit of cutting carbon emissions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
